page.title: 06 HOUSES AND UNDERPASSES
page.content: A VILLAGE PLAN IS WHERE PEOPLE CHANGE ROUND THE HOUSES SO THAT THE BACK GARDEN IS SMALLER AND THE FRONT IS BIGGER. SUTTON PARK WAS BUILT LIKE THIS BECAUSE THE ROADS ARE DANGEROUS AND IT IS MORE FRIENDLY. WE FOUND OUT ABOUT THE HOUSES BY DOING A SURVEY. THE DANGERS OF SHORT BACK GARDENS ARE THAT CHILDREN PLAYED IN THE BACK GARDENS AND RAN OUT INTO THE MAIN ROADS. AN UNDERPASS IS A KIND OF PATH THAT GOES UNDER THE ROADS. THE UNDERPASS IS MESSY WET AND HORRIBLE. PEOPLE DON'T USE THE UNDERPASS BECAUSE THERE ARE BIG CHILDREN ABOUT 16 WHO MUG PEOPLE GOING THROUGH. THEY HANG AROUND THE UNDERPASS. INSTEAD OF THE UNDERPASS WE COULD HAVE A FLYOVER THAT GOES OVER THE ROAD INSTEAD OF AN UNDERPASS THAT GOES UNDER THE ROAD.
